member.name: T:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifProperty
member.summary: Represents a single EXIF property.
member.remarks: Should try to serialize as EXIF+RDF http://www.w3.org/2003/12/exif/

member.name: M:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifProperty.#ctor
member.summary: Ctor

member.name: M:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifProperty.#ctor(ExifUtils.Exif.ExifTag,System.Object)
member.summary: Ctor

member.name: M:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifProperty.#ctor(System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem)
member.summary: Ctor

member.name: P:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifProperty.ID
member.summary: Gets and sets the Property ID according to the Exif specification for DCF images.

member.name: P:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifProperty.Tag
member.summary: Gets and sets the property name according to the Exif specification for DCF images.
member.remarks: Note: If the ExifTag value specifies the ExifType then ExifProperty.Type is automatically set. If the ExifTag does not specify the ExifType then ExifProperty.Type is left unchanged.

member.name: P:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifProperty.Type
member.summary: Gets and sets the EXIF data type.

member.name: P:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifProperty.Value
member.summary: Gets and sets the EXIF value.

member.name: P:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifProperty.DisplayValue
member.summary: Gets the formatted text representation of the value.

member.name: P:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifProperty.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets the formatted text representation of the label.

member.name: T:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifPropertyCollection
member.summary: Collection of ExifProperty items

member.name: M:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifPropertyCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Ctor

member.name: M:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifPropertyCollection.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ExifUtils.Exif.ExifProperty})
member.summary: Creates a ExifPropertyCollection from a collection of ExifProperties. Also works as a copy constructor.

member.name: M:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifPropertyCollection.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem},ExifUtils.Exif.ExifTag[])
member.summary: Creates a ExifPropertyCollection from a collection of PropertyItems.
member.param: filter of EXIF tags to include

member.name: M:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifPropertyCollection.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem},System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{ExifUtils.Exif.ExifTag})
member.summary: Creates a ExifPropertyCollection from a collection of PropertyItems only including explicitly named ExifTags.
member.param: filter of EXIF tags to include

member.name: P:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifPropertyCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.remarks: Warning: inefficient, used only for serialization

member.name: T:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifTag
member.summary: Defines EXIF Property Tag ID values.

member.name: T:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifType
member.summary: Defines types for Exif Properties.

member.name: F:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifType.Unknown
member.summary: Specifies that the type is either unknown or not defined.

member.name: F:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifType.Byte
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of bytes.

member.name: F:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifType.Ascii
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is a null-terminated ASCII string.
member.remarks: If you set ExifProperty.Type to , you should set the length data member to the length of the string including the NULL terminator. For example, the string HELLO would have a length of 6.

member.name: F:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifType.UInt16
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of signed short (16-bit) integers.

member.name: F:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifType.UInt32
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of unsigned long (32-bit) integers.

member.name: F:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifType.URational
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of pairs of unsigned long integers. Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.

member.name: F:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifType.Raw
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of bytes that can hold values of any data type.

member.name: F:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifType.Int32
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of signed long (32-bit) integers.

member.name: F:ExifUtils.Exif.ExifType.Rational
member.summary: Specifies that the value data member is an array of pairs of signed long integers. Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.

member.name: T:ExifUtils.Exif.TagValues.ExifTagOrientation
member.summary: Describes the operations which need to be performed to display the image. Alternatively the orientation of the camera when the image was captured.
member.remarks: All degrees are given as clockwise.
